content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”inside_page_layout_cover”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]Experience your best nights sleep with crisp, fresh and hygienically cleaned bedding and linen from THE LAUNDRY PRESS just like what you would find at a star hotel.

Bed linens , comforters and most of all pillow trap in allergens ,dust and body oils .our fine linen cleaning services removes everyday contaminants, and we will make sure your sheets are perfectly packed and pressed without a seem
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”153″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”wash_bottom_pics”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”155″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”154″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
